description: Visitor explores registry via landing page
steps: Load / to render landing experience with header, model table, and how-it-works section
Verify GitHub link and theme toggle appear in header
Use category filter buttons (All, Coding, Summarization, Research) to filter displayed models
Use snapshot dropdown to switch between latest and dated snapshots
Verify model cards update for each category showing primary and fallback models
Scroll to How it works section and verify API documentation is displayed
